name: TalkingDog
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: talking dog
des:
Have a back and forth conversation with your dog. 

You can also do the following:

*Praise it - just say good dog / I love you
*Tell it off - just say bad dog / naughty dog 
*Tell the dog to sleep - just say sleep / sleep time
*Tell it to wake up - just say wake up / time to get up
*Sing a Song - just say sing a song
*Give it Food - just say eat / have some food
*Give it a Drink - just say drink / have a drink
*Get it to sit - just say sit

To stop, you can say stop or goodbye.

-----------------------------------------------------------
Premium features:

You can buy treats for your dog to make it extra happy.
